body.name: IMGDD Twin Over Twin Metal Bunk Bed,Metal Structure Bedframe with Safety Guardrails and 2 ladders,Convertible Bunkbeds,No Spring Box Required and Space Saving Design (Black)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
features: Able to split: This metal bunk bed can be converted in to two individual beds. A perfect addition for growing teens, allowing them the freedom and space to host friends. The bottom bunk clearance is 13.1 inches, you can put a storage box under the bed to tidy up the clothes, toys or quilts.

Sturdy Construction & Secure Guardrail: This twin over twin bunk bed is made of quality tested steel frame with anti-rust powder coated finish, eliminating excess wobbling. Upper bunk's safety rail is 11.7''-height, high enough to protect from accidently falling off.

Space-saving Design: Twin over Twin Bunk beds is simply a great solution for situation in which space needs to be saved. When there are lots of family members or a lot of kids then a l bunk bed could be just the right choice for the whole family. allow for enough room to play around.
Easy Assembly: The twin bunk bed frame comes flat-packed with essential tool in one box for easy home assembly. All parts are clearly labeled, easy to assemble with clear installation instructions.

Metal Frame Twin Bed: The bunk bed with stairs is made of sturdy metal with built-in reinforced metal slats for tremendous support. The twin frame definitely stands the test of time. Upper bunk holds 400 lbs, lower bunk holds 400 lbs.
Safety and Security: There are 2 built-in side ladders to ensure easier access to the top bunk, while full-length safety rails around the top bunk protect people from falling off.
